case_name: New Hampshire Ball Bearing, Inc. v. United States

docket_entries.description: Summons. Filed by Frank H. Morgan of White & Case, LLP on behalf of New Hampshire Ball Bearing, Inc.. (Morgan, Frank) (Entered: 11/13/2008)

Complaint against all defendants. Answer due by 1/20/2009. Filed by Frank H. Morgan of White & Case, LLP on behalf of New Hampshire Ball Bearing, Inc.. (Morgan, Frank) (Entered: 11/13/2008)
Motion to stay. Responses due by 12/3/2008. Filed by Frank H. Morgan of White & Case, LLP on behalf of New Hampshire Ball Bearing, Inc.. (Morgan, Frank) (Entered: 11/13/2008)

Order entered on 11/28/2008 assigning action to Judges Three-Judge Panel6.(Washington, Carolyn) (Entered: 11/28/2008)
Form 11 Notice of Appearance. Filed by Michael James Dierberg of U.S. Department of Justice on behalf of United States Customs and Border Protection.(Dierberg, Michael) (Entered: 12/02/2008)

Response to motion to stay (related document(s) 5 ). Filed by Michael James Dierberg of U.S. Department of Justice on behalf of United States Customs and Border Protection.(Dierberg, Michael) (Entered: 12/02/2008)
